channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows kernel in Microsoft Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703, and Windows Server 2016
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows kernel in Microsoft Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703, and Windows Server 2016

item.title: CVE-2017-8561|2024-08-05T16:41:23.691Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20kernel%20in%20microsoft%20windows%208.1%2C%20windows%20server%202012%20gold%20and%20r2%2C%20windows%20rt%208.1%2C%20windows%2010%20gold%2C%201511%2C%201607%2C%20and%201703%2C%20and%20windows%20server%202016
item.description: Windows kernel in Microsoft Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703, and Windows Server 2016 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to the way it handles objects in memory, aka "Windows Kernel Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
